product_name: The North Face Mossbud Insulated Reversible Vest - Women's
long_description: The North Face Mossbud insulated vest delivers cozy warmth with a reversible design that doubles your style options and lets you choose your specific look. Smooth, partially-recycled polyester shell features PrimaLoft(R) Eco recycled polyester insulation for warmth and comfort. Reversible side features contrasting high-loft polyester pile fleece. Secure snap pockets on smooth polyester shell side; open hand pockets on fleece side. Bound neck and armholes ensure comfort and a great fit.
short_description: The North Face Mossbud insulated vest delivers cozy warmth with a reversible design that doubles your style options and lets you choose your specific look.
